headline: Here’s Why Weitz Multi-Cap Equity Fund Exited VeriSign (VRSN)
summary: Weitz Investment Management, an investment management firm, released its “Multi-Cap Equity Fund” fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund’s Institutional Class returned 15.80% in the calendar year compared to +23.81% for the Russell 3000. The fund returned -0.57% for the fourth quarter compared to +2.63% for the […]
